problems.title: Array Sum
problems.description: Calculate the sum of all elements in an array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print the sum of all array elements

problems.title: Find Maximum
problems.description: Find and print the maximum element in an array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Find Minimum
problems.description: Find and print the minimum element in an array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Count Even Numbers
problems.description: Count how many even numbers are in the array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print the count of even numbers

problems.title: Count Odd Numbers
problems.description: Count how many odd numbers are in the array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print the count of odd numbers

problems.title: Count Positive Numbers
problems.description: Count how many positive numbers (greater than 0) are in the array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print the count of positive numbers

problems.title: Count Negative Numbers
problems.description: Count how many negative numbers (less than 0) are in the array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print the count of negative numbers

problems.title: Array Average
problems.description: Calculate and print the average of all elements in the array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Search Element
problems.description: Search for a given element in the array. Print 1 if found, 0 if not found.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers
Third line: x (element to search)
problems.outputFormat: Print 1 if element is found, 0 otherwise

problems.title: Reverse Array
problems.description: Print the array elements in reverse order.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print array elements in reverse order, space-separated
